sentences.english: The irony is that milk may actually lead to tooth decay.
sentences.chinese: 諷刺的是牛奶或許恰恰導致蛀牙。

sentences.english: Are there certain foods that might cause cavities?
sentences.chinese: 是否有某些食物可能導致蛀牙？

sentences.english: We know fluoride has a great track record in diminishing the risk of decay.
sentences.chinese: 我們知道氟化物在降低蛀牙危險方面卓有成效”。

sentences.english: Fill a refined, or even haven't found the tooth decay. As a new feeling, is not only the teeth, but their love.
sentences.chinese: 愛蓮補了一顆常人，或者說連自己都沒發現的蛀牙。

sentences.english: It prevents tooth decay and cures bad breath.
sentences.chinese: 綠茶能防止蛀牙，治癒口臭。

sentences.english: and I taught them how to brush their teeth in tiny circles so they wouldn't get cavities.
sentences.chinese: 教他們如何用牙刷轉圈兒刷牙以免得蛀牙。

sentences.english: Oolong suppresses dental plaque and helps prevent cavities.
sentences.chinese: 烏龍茶能抑制牙菌斑及幫助預防蛀牙。

sentences.english: Fill a refined, or even haven't found the tooth decay.
sentences.chinese: 愛蓮補了一顆常人，或者說連自己都沒發現的蛀牙。

sentences.english: John had the dentist pull his bad tooth out yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 約翰昨天請牙醫師把他的蛀牙拔掉了。

sentences.english: A bad tooth can cause acute pain.
sentences.chinese: 一顆蛀牙可以引起激烈的疼痛。

sentences.english: Green tea also averts tooth decay and makes teeth more resistant to acids.
sentences.chinese: 綠茶還能防止蛀牙的產生，使牙齒很好地抵抗酸性。

sentences.english: Tartar can cause tooth decay if not removed by polishing teeth.
sentences.chinese: 牙垢可引起蛀牙，如果不通過拋光去除牙齒。

sentences.english: Eliminate fatigue, promote metabolism, prevent tooth decay.
sentences.chinese: 消除疲勞，促進新陳代謝，防蛀牙。

sentences.english: I'll put a special covering over the deepest Part of the cavity to protect the pulp.
sentences.chinese: 我要在蛀牙洞最深的地方特別塞上東西保護蛀牙髓。

definition: caries/rotten tooth (colloquial)/see also 齲齒|龋齿[qu3 chi3]
permanent tooth (as opposed to deciduous tooth 乳牙)/adult tooth
to fill a tooth (cavity)/to have a tooth filled/a dental filling
